name: validate_asset_client_ids
description: Validates the asset_client_ids exist in the vector store

id.description: The ID of the work order

summary.description: A summary of the work order

matches.description: Match work orders to relevant equipment assessments. Each assessment represents a specific piece of equipment that needs inspection or maintenance. Use the vector store to find relevant assessments based on equipment names, IDs, and descriptions.

asset_client_id.description: Client ID of the asset. Example: '5323-0220-35' or 'VNA-OXY-5208-450'. Must match an existing asset client ID from the vector store.

matching_reasoning.description: Explain why this assessment matches the work order
